video.title: One Tea A Week Introduction Video Podcast
video.description:
A warm welcome from me, Josh Chandler of joshchandlerblog.com to the "first episode" of One Tea A Week, a much introduction focussed show, official first episode is next week.

For more information and previous shows visit:
http://www.oneteaaweek.com

To find out more about me visit:
http://www.oneteaaweek.com/about

Email me at:
oneteaaweek@gmail.com
